item.title: By: gesikah
item.dc:creator: gesikah
item.description:
I got in!!
And the doctor said that, barring any complications, I should be able to live a full, happy life with only one kidney! Wooters
item.content:encoded:
I got in!!

And the doctor said that, barring any complications, I should be able to live a full, happy life with only one kidney! Wooters

item.title: By: Acacia
item.dc:creator: Acacia
item.description: Not buggy? How about Nagas that makes us crash everytime you click them in an instance? ;p
item.content:encoded: Not buggy? How about Nagas that makes us crash everytime you click them in an instance? ;p

item.title: By: Bluekar
item.dc:creator: Bluekar
item.description: I'm torn really. Nightfall is out this week, so I'm glad I get extra time for that. However, I get the feeling that just when I get into Nightfall I'll get my guild beta key. At any rate, time to withdraw the vacation request. ;)
item.content:encoded: I’m torn really. Nightfall is out this week, so I’m glad I get extra time for that. However, I get the feeling that just when I get into Nightfall I’ll get my guild beta key. At any rate, time to withdraw the vacation request. üòâ

item.title: By: ratmggot
item.dc:creator: ratmggot
item.description:
Ah well. Let's face it. when it was announced, we all thought it was due in July 06. We've waited this long, we can wait a little longer. Maybe it's time to give myself a hoarde alt, for a break.
That said, it'll give me lots of time for Gears Of War.
item.content:encoded:
Ah well. Let’s face it. when it was announced, we all thought it was due in July 06. We’ve waited this long, we can wait a little longer. Maybe it’s time to give myself a hoarde alt, for a break.

That said, it’ll give me lots of time for Gears Of War.

item.title: By: q
item.dc:creator: q
item.description:
Part of me is kinda upset that the expansion isn't going to be released "as it should have been". I stopped playing 5 months ago, for lack of "casual" content, and my inability to join a raiding guild with no retarded schedules, and i what i've seen and read about the xpac so far really made me want to play again.
On the other hand, i know Blizzard (sounds like a fanboi rant, eh ?) and i know that these two extra months means more polish, more details, eck, even a few more quests and fluff for us to enjoy until the next xpac.
Now if only i could find something to play until January .. :)
item.content:encoded:
Part of me is kinda upset that the expansion isn’t going to be released “as it should have been”. I stopped playing 5 months ago, for lack of “casual” content, and my inability to join a raiding guild with no retarded schedules, and i what i’ve seen and read about the xpac so far really made me want to play again.

On the other hand, i know Blizzard (sounds like a fanboi rant, eh ?) and i know that these two extra months means more polish, more details, eck, even a few more quests and fluff for us to enjoy until the next xpac.

Now if only i could find something to play until January .. üôÇ

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description: Dammit, my 'I've been raiding too much' break was perfectly timed with my 'I don't want to run BWL for a 100th time to get a item I'll replace in a week' lack of motivation - I was set to peak again come BC release. This delay will throw off my whole timeline.
item.content:encoded: Dammit, my ‘I’ve been raiding too much’ break was perfectly timed with my ‘I don’t want to run BWL for a 100th time to get a item I’ll replace in a week’ lack of motivation – I was set to peak again come BC release. This delay will throw off my whole timeline.
